images.alt_text: AI-selected This hero image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of summer in Paris, showcasing outdoor concerts, romantic walks along the Seine, and culinary experiences.
AI-selected This destination image will visually represent Paris during summer, highlighting the beauty of the city with a focus on culture and festivities.
AI-selected These promotional icons will highlight special offers and deals related to the campaign, enhancing user engagement and ease of booking.
AI-selected These promotional icons will highlight special offers and deals related to the campaign, enhancing user engagement and ease of booking.
AI-selected The logo will be placed in the header to establish brand identity and trustworthiness for the campaign.
AI-selected The background pattern will create a cohesive and inviting atmosphere for the email layout, enhancing the overall aesthetic.

assetRequirements.purpose: main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of summer in Paris
assetRequirements.visual_style: elegant and artistic, showcasing Parisian landmarks and summer activities
assetRequirements.content_context: depicting the romantic atmosphere of summer in Paris with outdoor concerts, Seine river walks, and gastronomic experiences

assetRequirements.purpose: highlight the beauty and attractions of Paris during summer
assetRequirements.visual_style: colorful and lively, featuring summer events and cultural experiences
assetRequirements.content_context: showcasing the festive atmosphere of Paris in summer with street festivals and outdoor dining

usageInstructions.placement: Place at top of email as main header image with full width
usageInstructions.context: Use in context of: Летний Париж ждет вас!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
usageInstructions.responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
usageInstructions.accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected This hero image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of summer in Paris, showcasing outdoor concerts, romantic walks along the Seine, and culinary experiences.". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
usageInstructions.fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
